reviews.review_text: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can t thank the shop enough. My daughter lives in Vancouver and I called on her behalf and the shop was able to help her out with same-day service. My daughter is a person with a disability, so her vehicle is very important to her as accessible transportation is not always available. The shop was very understanding, very responsive and very helpful. Would definitely go back!  Special thanks to Alex for the exceptional above and beyond service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you so much for your heartfelt feedback! Were truly humbled to hear about your positive experience with our service. Ensuring that all our customers feel heard and cared for is our top priority. Its reassuring to know that Alex could provide the exceptional service that we always strive for, especially in situations that matter most. You and your daughters trust in our service means a lot, and were always here to assist with any future needs. Please dont hesitate to reach out anytime! Warm regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Loyal customer here. Keep coming back here to get My Auto done. Great job to all the staff most of all GENESIS, JOEY and Kevin who always give the best excellent service and being helpful to us. Thank you all for doing all your best. Kudos to all.

Effective and efficient service from Canadian Tire! They were timely and communicative with what was happening. In particular, Justin at the front desk was SO helpful! He was the only consistent employee at the desk and helped incoming customers as well as writing up reports and checking in with the service team. He was polite, professional, and so helpful!! I really, really appreciate him!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Sam, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! Were thrilled to hear about the effective and efficient service you received. Justin is indeed an invaluable member of our team and were delighted to hear about the exceptional service he provided. Well be sure to share your kind words with him   hell surely appreciate it! Thank you for choosing Canadian Tire for your automotive needs. We look forward to serving you again in the future! Best Regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Shan, Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Ive passed this on to the both of them, and they truly appreciated your kind words. We hope you have a wonderful weekend, and a safe trip home. Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: 5 stars specifically for Genesis. I called in before bringing in my car(flat tire) and was told by the representative that they have the exact same tire on location and provided me the latest time/day it will be finished. That day came and when I called to check if my car is ready, turned out they do not have the tire and will have to be ordered and shipped from a different location. At this point, I was given another day/time when it will be completed. I received a call saying my car is finished, I came back and the car is not ready nor is the tire even on location. No one seems to be taking ownership of the 2 mistakes with the exception of Genesis. He took ownership of the issue and provided me with creative solutions to have the car ready at the time I needed it by. He was able to have my car ready within a very short time frame. We (consumers) need more reps like Genesis. Service: Tires
Always great and on the spot. Not cheap but at least they do really know what they do and they do it as fast as they can

Amazing people: I have an emergency with my tire and it was 15min to close. They decided to change the spare tire for me for free and provided lots useful informations. I love how the staff here are so honey and sincere. I will definitely come here for everything      thank you guys for the emergency in that rainy night!
The mechanics saw my car with a cooling problem the day of on Canada Day and got it fixed in under 4 hours. Can t get better service than that.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello there, Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience, especially on Canada Day! Ensuring our customers are back on the road safely and swiftly is our top priority. Thank you for trusting us with your cars cooling issue. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to assisting you again in the future. Warm regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Shop foreman Robbie did a fine job for me. Went above and beyond.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Anthony, Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your positive feedback about Robbie, our shop foreman. We are thrilled to hear that he was able to go above and beyond to meet your needs. At Canadian Tire, we take pride in our staff and their commitment to excellent customer service. Ill make sure to pass on your kind words to Robbie. If there is anything else we can assist you with, please dont hesitate to reach out. Best regards,

reviews.review_text: When I was getting an oil change at a different provider they had indicated to me that I needed to get my transmission fluid refilled. I chose not to do that at that provider. I checked it myself and then popped up to Canadian Tire Auto and one of the gentleman helped me and validated that I didn t need to get it refilled / topped up. I appreciated his honesty and willingness to help me out!
Shawn, John and Alex, thank you for helping with the tire problem in last minute. Much apreciate your help and fast thinking.

I recently had a wonderful experience at this location, with amazing customer service from Gen and Allen, the technician. When my car broke down while visiting from the US, they fit me in on short notice and stayed late to help me get home only one day later than planned. I really appreciated their great communication, reasonable prices, and going above and beyond to resolve the issues.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Isabelle, Thank you so much for the kind words! Ive passed this on to Gen and Alen, and they were both very happy to see their efforts didnt go unnoticed! We are also glad to hear you got home safely, and would like to thank you for your business. Have a great weekend! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire Automotive Service work over their duties to assure I had a great service and explain further regarding my car problems. Also referring to a different shop for the job it cant be performed in their own shop. Rob know his way around cars and he broke down the explanation to make sure I know what to do next. And gave his expertise on any advice he provided. I widely recommend their services and assure you that your car is in great hands.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Miguel, Thank you for the 5 star review! Im happy to see your visit with us was a positive one. Have a wonderful Christmas! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Simply the best auto shop Ive been to on all accounts. The work done is always top notch, timely, and well priced. The customer staff have always been helpful and courteous. Unlike other shops I had tried before, its nice to see that the staff here take the time to help you from start to finish rather than get interrupted every time someone comes to the counter for a quick question. Definitely recommend this auto shop for anyone who wants to make sure their vehicle is serviced properly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Hans! Thank you very much for your kind words. We work very hard to provide every customer with the best service possible, so I am happy to hear your experience with us reflected that. We look forward to seeing you again! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Cambie Canadian Tire Service Center 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Friendly service/admin group. I had my tire inspected as another mechanic found a nail stuck on my left car tire and suggested I get it checked and to not pull it out in case it would cause more damage. After a quick half hour at Canadian tire, I got a call back and they had discovered the nail was a small screw and hadnt in fact punctured the tire but just the in tracks. They didnt charge me a cent for this and I went on my merry way.

Made an appointment to get an oil change and a new battery installed. Service was fast and friendly and I was pleasantly surprised that it didnt cost me an arm and a leg. Top tier service. Bravo to the team at this location.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Steven, Thank you so much for your recent business and wonderful feedback! Our team is always happy to help and we are thrilled to hear your visit was a positive one. Have a great week! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: I have taken my car here for a few years now. Always courteous staff and great work. Today, they quickly fixed the rock plate of my car, Sal allowed me to come pick it up after closing which I appreciated.

My car completely died on Yukon in front of the auto shop and as I was pushing the car into the ally, Mark saw and came to help. The shop had already closed, but he asked his two colleagues to come take a look. They did a few tests and ruled out that it was likely a dead battery. Jake and Genesis stayed after hours to replace my battery so that I could get home safely. I am so grateful for the three of them for going above and beyond to help me out on a rainy Friday night.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Chelsia, Thank you very much for the positive review! Our team was happy to help and we are glad you got home safely. Please keep us in mind for any future needs your vehicle may have! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: I went in for my class 7 road test, but wasn t able to leave the icbc parking lot, because my brake lights weren t working. I went to Canadian Tire to see if I could potentially get them fixed so I could go back and retry the test, and they fixed them immediately. Excellent and fast service!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Fraser, I am very happy to hear about your positive experience with us! We do our best to help customers in time of need, and we truly appreciate your business. Have a great weekend! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Brought my Ferrari in for a safety inspection.  I imported it from Ontario...so it needs the BC safety inspection before it can be registered and licensed in BC. These folks were so accommodating with time frames to get me in when my car arrived in Vancouver. Very friendly on the phone and in person. But the thing that put this shop over the top was when they did with my car when it was ready for pick up. See the photo. I mean how incredibly thoughtful... Parking my pride and joy way off in the  corner in a dedicated double spot so there is was chance or an errant door ding from a car parked next door, or an unmanned runaway shopping cart! Thanks to the folks at Can Tire for the thoughtful gesture.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello there, Ive shared this with the team, and everyone was thrilled to see your appreciation for detail! We take pride in taking care of all our customers cars, and your beauty was definitely no exception. Im glad we were able to accommodate a time for you, and greatly appreciate the feedback and 5 star review. Enjoy the roads! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: I called in the afternoon of the 18th with an urgent issue and Genesis was able to fit me in with Robbie, the shop foreman. He was able to diagnose and repair the issue last minute. Im so grateful for the help, absolutely above and beyond service at this location. Thank you guys so much for helping me out, I appreciate it more than you could know. Anxiety attack avoided! Thank you so much!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Elicia, Thank you so much for the positive feedback! Both Genesis and Rob were thrilled to see they were able to make a difference. Stay warm, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

Definitely will continue to use Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre. -Liam

reviews.review_text: Genesis in the auto department is freaking awesome, went above and beyond to help me. This helped me so much, probably the best shopping experience Ive ever had Services: Tires , Wheel alignment

reviews.review_text: Alex, John, and Mark were great at helping me out!

Our team always aims to provide the best service, and its heartening to see it recognized. We look forward to serving you again in the future. Warm regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Hello I d like to express the greatest gratitude to Johnny Ray Ritchie and his team of specialists for having brought my vehicle back to running condition and returned it to my property over the weekend.  The team was knowledgeable, transparent, and went the extra mile to order the necessary parts from out of country or did the repair if possible when parts are no longer available.  Despite me being only in town only during the month of Aug I was kept updated via email every step along the way and work continued long after I left for another 2 months. The vehicle involved is a 91 deVille which had sat idled for around 5 years with numerous issues.  It had a decomposed flat tire, dead battery, engine wouldn t start even when jumped, and inoperative windows.  It was towed in with an objective of bringing it back to road running condition. After initial diagnostic it was discovered the fuel tank was cracked and the fuel pump was non functional.  I was advised up front the potential of finding additional faults so the hidden costs may exceed the vehicle s worth such that I was able to make an informed decision and set the correct expectations. Since then the team went on to identify additional faults.  The AC compressor and power steering fluid line were replaced.  For the pulley system it was initially suspected that both the AC compressor and water pump pulleys were faulty.  I was expecting both to be replaced but the team took the extra time to confirm only the AC compressor pulley needed work.  For the windows switches, they investigated both buying original parts removed from other vehicles vs disassembling the mechanical switches to try repairing themselves.  They decided to try the latter to save costs for the parts. Worth mentioning is a vehicle like this wouldn t have been able to be serviced if it was brought into the dealership.  Not knowing when I d be back in the country next a scheduled reminder have been put on my profile so a quote will be sent to me a year from now for the vehicle to be towed back in for its next annual maintenance. As a customer I was not only impressed with the team doing what they needed to do to get the vehicle repaired given the scarcity of parts, I was also extremely pleased with the way Johnny managed it, and did what he could to keep the costs down. Regards, Titus Cheung
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Titus, Id like to personally thank you for your very detailed feedback. It was a pleasure having you as a customer, and we look forward to servicing your vehicle in October! If there is anything more we can do, please do not hesitate to give us a call! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service Center 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: I came to the front desk wanting to know the best price for my car window repair, and Daniel thoroughly answered all of my questions regarding that. Very informative with his suggestions and even referred me to an affordable location. Exactly what I was looking for. Daniel was fantastic. Above and beyond service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello there, We thank you for your kind words and 5 star review! Daniel is definitely one of our top service advisors, and Im very happy to hear he was able to help you out. Do not hesitate to reach out to either of us if you have any more questions! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service Center 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: great service!! took a used car in for the pre purchase inspection. its a very detailed checklist, easy to read and understand. I would recommend this place to anyone, and I will definitely come back myself.

We are on vacation and got a flat tire. We came and purchased a new one. The team was extremely helpful and professional. They went above and beyond with their service making our little vacation hiccup feel like a breeze. Thank you!!

reviews.review_text: Good service, efficient staff with smile (purely for business). Quite notorious for up sell or extended diagnostic......  though work is guaranteed no complaints here. Keep eyes on canadian tire automotive promotions to self-feel better; always prepare spending couple of hundred dollars beyond your expectations and budget.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Parvaz, Thank you very much for the positive review! As you mentioned, my team is in fact trained to recommend inspections and diagnostics be performed to isolate most of our customers concerns. This is to ensure the repairs are guaranteed, instead of wasting money on repairs that arent needed. It can definitely get expensive if you have multiple concerns, but we do our absolute best to keep things affordable for our customers. We have heard way too many horror stories of technicians replacing parts based on codes or uneducated guesses, and simply do not want to fall into that category. Standing behind our work is important to us, and we cannot do that if we dont encourage due diligence from the start. We appreciate both your feedback and business! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: So far the most friendly staff in the automotive service department.  Thank you to these amazing staff who will make you feel welcomed. Thank you to Mark, Danash and Shannan.  I visited Feb 5 to change my tire and they made it so easy. I will  be doing my service in this location from now on. Thank you! :)
Glad to see the opening hours have been updated
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Will, Im sorry to see such a negative review despite not even giving us the opportunity to provide you with any sort of service. Our hours of operation for the Service Center have remained the same over the last few years. They are 7am to 7pm on weekdays, and 8am to 7pm on weekends. We have never claimed to be open until 10pm.  We have experienced issues with Google changing our hours in the past, so I apologize if this has caused you any inconvenience. I hope you understand and give us a chance to turn this into a positive experience/review. *Update* Thank you very much for your understanding. We truly appreciate your updated review, and if there is anything we can do for you, please do not hesitate to reach out to me personally. Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

reviews.review_text: Service Center is great.
